name: @bearcove/styx-webmd
description: Markdown rendering with syntax highlighting for Styx docs
author: Amos Wenger <amos@bearcove.eu>

scripts.build: cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen --out-dir dist --target bundler target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/styx_webmd.wasm
